fields.app_short_description: Summary information of DES releases and validation
fields.app_long_description:
It includes the following functionalities:
  • Flag images with artifacts
  • Add comments associated to a position (annotations)
  • Ability to mark defects associated to position like Airplane trails, Bright horizontal stripes, Bright star, Cosmic Ray, Ghosts, Incomplete tile, Noisybackground, Satellite trails, Scattered light
  • Overlay of objects and object properties
  • View statistic of defects
  • Overlay of CCDs and mangle mask

fields.app_short_description: All-sky visualization of DES releases in grizY and RGB with overlay of tile grid and objects
fields.app_long_description:
The main functionalities are:

Footprint

  • All-sky visualization in spherical projection
  • grizY and RGB HiPS images for DES releases
  • HiPS images from other suverys like 2MASS, WISE, DSS, SDSS9 as well as extinction and Halpha maps for comparions
  • Visualization of HEALPIX maps
  • Hierarchical overlay of objects
  • Overlay of polygons like DES footprint, tile grid CCDs and healpix grid
  • Search by RA, Dec or tilename
  • Direct link to specific RA, Dec position specified in the URL
  • Export the current view to PNG
  • Access to Tile Viewer

Mosaic

  • Mosaic of thumbnails (400 x 400 pixels) for each tile in grizY and RGB for rapid evaluation of features in the co-add images
  • Ability to flag a tile
  • Link to the Tile Viewer

Tile List

  • Information for each tile like Tilename, RA, Dec, l, b, and Dataset in a searchable and sortable table
  • Link to the Tile Viewer

fields.app_short_description: Manage lists of targets with image display, cutouts, ranking and reject functionalities.
fields.app_long_description:
The main functionalities of the Target viewer are:
  • Manage lists of targets
  • Ability to upload
  • Image preview
  • List and Mosaic visualization
  • Ranking and reject
  • Ability to make FITS and PNG cutouts
  • SAbility to export target lists and cutouts

Target Viewer has an extension called Target Properties based on the type of target. For instance for a Galaxy Cluster target, we can overlay a circle representing its virial radius or overlay X-Ray contours, etc.

fields.app_short_description: Query catalogs using sample queries or keep your own query library
Upload external data to the Science Server
Create co-added or single epoch cutouts from a list of coordinates
Serve catalogs created by the collaboration

fields.ttr_description:
Brief presentation of the main functions of Sky Viewer.
Navigate between the tiles of a release, compare images, overplot objects.
